description: Try our easy to follow Avocado & Za'atar Grilled Chicken Wrap recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Avocado & Za'atar Grilled Chicken Wrap Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To build the wrap, add a handful of baby spinach, followed by half the grilled capsicum. Add half the chicken breast sliced into strips followed by half the avocado slices. Spoon over a good dollop of the herb sauce. Roll the wrap up and place it back on the BBQ grill until lightly heated. Repeat for the second wrap. Serve straight away.
